/* Dossiê */
LEFT JOIN
(
SELECT EmailAddress, 'TRUE' as is_active, MIN(payment_date) as dt
FROM ENT.DE_JOLIVI_PAID WHERE status = 'complete'  AND (plan_id IN (102200012) OR chosen_product in (102200012)) and (coalesce(parent_id,'0') not in ('102927012','102224012','200631099','202733099'))
GROUP BY EmailAddress
) as  dossie ON p.EmailAddress = dossie.EmailAddress

/* Remédio Natural */
LEFT JOIN
(
SELECT EmailAddress, 'TRUE' as is_active, MIN(payment_date) as dt
FROM ENT.DE_JOLIVI_PAID WHERE status = 'complete' AND (plan_id IN (103300012) AND (coalesce(parent_id,'0') not in ('103300030','103322012','202733099')))
GROUP BY EmailAddress
) as remedio_natural ON p.EmailAddress = remedio_natural.EmailAddress

/* Remédio Natural Mensal */
LEFT JOIN
(
SELECT EmailAddress, 'TRUE' as is_active, MIN(payment_date) as dt
FROM ENT.DE_JOLIVI_PAID WHERE (status = 'complete' OR status = 'pending' OR status = 'new') AND (plan_id IN (103300001) or chosen_product in (103300001) and coalesce(parent_id,'0') not in ('202733099'))
GROUP BY EmailAddress
) as remedio_natural_m ON p.EmailAddress = remedio_natural_m.EmailAddress

/* Book Offer Remédio */
LEFT JOIN
(
SELECT EmailAddress, 'TRUE' as is_active, MIN(payment_date) as dt
FROM ENT.DE_JOLIVI_PAID WHERE (status = 'complete' OR status = 'pending' OR status = 'new' ) AND (plan_id IN (101100000) OR chosen_product in (101100000)) AND parent_id = 'book-offer-remedio-natural'
GROUP BY EmailAddress
) as remedio_bk_offer ON p.EmailAddress = remedio_bk_offer.EmailAddress

FROM ENT.DE_JOLIVI_PAID WHERE status = 'complete' AND parent_id = '103322012'
GROUP BY EmailAddress
) as remedio_natural_anual_bb ON p.EmailAddress = remedio_natural_anual_bb.EmailAddress
/*remedio_dossie_anual_bb*/
LEFT JOIN
(
SELECT EmailAddress, 'TRUE' as is_active, MIN(payment_date) as dt
FROM ENT.DE_JOLIVI_PAID WHERE status = 'complete' AND parent_id = '102224012'
GROUP BY EmailAddress
) as dossie_anual_bb ON p.EmailAddress = dossie_anual_bb.EmailAddress
/*dossie_vit_expresso_bb*/
LEFT JOIN
(
SELECT EmailAddress, 'TRUE' as is_active, MIN(payment_date) as dt
FROM ENT.DE_JOLIVI_PAID WHERE status = 'complete' AND parent_id = '102225099'
GROUP BY EmailAddress
) as dossie_vit_expresso_bb ON p.EmailAddress = dossie_vit_expresso_bb.EmailAddress
/*confraria*/
LEFT JOIN
(
SELECT EmailAddress, 'TRUE' as is_active, MIN(payment_date) as dt
FROM ENT.DE_JOLIVI_PAID WHERE status = 'complete' AND parent_id = '202700099'
GROUP BY EmailAddress
) as confraria ON p.EmailAddress = confraria.EmailAddress
/*Conexão Anual + O Grande Livro*/
LEFT JOIN
(
SELECT EmailAddress, 'TRUE' as is_active, MIN(payment_date) as dt
FROM ENT.DE_JOLIVI_PAID WHERE status = 'complete' AND parent_id = '100524012'
GROUP BY EmailAddress
) as conexao_cerebro_anual_bb ON p.EmailAddress = conexao_cerebro_anual_bb.EmailAddress
/*Conexão Vitalício + Expresso + O Grande Livro*/
LEFT JOIN
(
SELECT EmailAddress, 'TRUE' as is_active, MIN(payment_date) as dt
FROM ENT.DE_JOLIVI_PAID WHERE status = 'complete' AND parent_id = '100525099'
GROUP BY EmailAddress
) as conexao_cerebro_vit_expresso_bb ON p.EmailAddress = conexao_cerebro_vit_expresso_bb.EmailAddress
/*Clube + O Grande Livro da Saúde Natural */
LEFT JOIN
(
SELECT EmailAddress, 'TRUE' as is_active, MIN(payment_date) as dt
FROM ENT.DE_JOLIVI_PAID WHERE status = 'complete' AND parent_id = '101426099'
GROUP BY EmailAddress
) as clube_bb ON p.EmailAddress = clube_bb.EmailAddress
/*Supercerebro sem alzheimer*/
LEFT JOIN
(
SELECT EmailAddress, 'TRUE' as is_active, MIN(payment_date) as dt
FROM ENT.DE_JOLIVI_PAID WHERE status = 'complete' AND parent_id = '203028099'
GROUP BY EmailAddress
) as supercerebro_alzheimer ON p.EmailAddress = supercerebro_alzheimer.EmailAddress
/*Oferta Dossiê Saúde Essencial + O Grande Livro */
LEFT JOIN
(
SELECT EmailAddress, 'TRUE' as is_active, MIN(payment_date) as dt
FROM ENT.DE_JOLIVI_PAID WHERE status = 'complete' AND parent_id = '102927012'
GROUP BY EmailAddress
) as se_essencial_livro ON p.EmailAddress = se_essencial_livro.EmailAddress
/*Palavra do Dr. Lair + Livro CAI*/
LEFT JOIN
(
SELECT EmailAddress, 'TRUE' as is_active, MIN(payment_date) as dt
FROM ENT.DE_JOLIVI_PAID WHERE status = 'complete' AND parent_id in ('100420012','100434012')
GROUP BY EmailAddress
) as plr_livro_cai ON p.EmailAddress = plr_livro_cai.EmailAddress
/*Supercerebro sem alzheimer essencial*/
LEFT JOIN
(
SELECT EmailAddress, 'TRUE' as is_active, MIN(payment_date) as dt
FROM ENT.DE_JOLIVI_PAID WHERE status = 'complete' AND parent_id = '203029099'
GROUP BY EmailAddress
) as supercerebro_alzheimer_essencial ON p.EmailAddress = supercerebro_alzheimer_essencial.EmailAddress
/*Conexão Anual + O Grande Livro sem boleto*/
LEFT JOIN
(
SELECT EmailAddress, 'TRUE' as is_active, MIN(payment_date) as dt
FROM ENT.DE_JOLIVI_PAID WHERE status = 'complete' AND parent_id = '100530012'
GROUP BY EmailAddress
) as cc_anual_bb_sem_boleto ON p.EmailAddress = cc_anual_bb_sem_boleto.EmailAddress
/*Homem de Ferro + Dossiê anual + O Grande livro*/
LEFT JOIN
(
SELECT EmailAddress, 'TRUE' as is_active, MIN(payment_date) as dt
FROM ENT.DE_JOLIVI_PAID WHERE status = 'complete' AND parent_id = '200631099'
GROUP BY EmailAddress
) as hf_se_bb ON p.EmailAddress = hf_se_bb.EmailAddress
/*Coração Anti-Infarto + Livro*/
LEFT JOIN
(
SELECT EmailAddress, 'TRUE' as is_active, MIN(payment_date) as dt
FROM ENT.DE_JOLIVI_PAID WHERE status = 'complete' AND parent_id = '202132099'
GROUP BY EmailAddress
) as cai_livro ON p.EmailAddress = cai_livro.EmailAddress
/*Homem de Ferro - Essencial*/
LEFT JOIN
(
SELECT EmailAddress, 'TRUE' as is_active, MIN(payment_date) as dt
FROM ENT.DE_JOLIVI_PAID WHERE status = 'complete' AND parent_id = '200632006'
GROUP BY EmailAddress
) as hf_essential ON p.EmailAddress = hf_essential.EmailAddress
/*Diabetes Zero*/
LEFT JOIN
(
SELECT EmailAddress, 'TRUE' as is_active, MIN(payment_date) as dt
FROM ENT.DE_JOLIVI_PAID WHERE status = 'complete' AND parent_id = '203236099'
GROUP BY EmailAddress
) as db_zero ON p.EmailAddress = db_zero.EmailAddress
/*Diabetes Zero Essencial*/
LEFT JOIN
(
SELECT EmailAddress, 'TRUE' as is_active, MIN(payment_date) as dt
FROM ENT.DE_JOLIVI_PAID WHERE status = 'complete' AND parent_id = '303237099'
GROUP BY EmailAddress
) as db_zero_essencial ON p.EmailAddress = db_zero_essencial.EmailAddress
/*Reserva*/
LEFT JOIN
(
SELECT EmailAddress, 'TRUE' as is_active, MIN(payment_date) as dt
FROM ENT.DE_JOLIVI_PAID WHERE status = 'complete' AND parent_id = '202733099'
GROUP BY EmailAddress)
  as reserva ON p.EmailAddress = reserva.EmailAddress
LEFT JOIN ENT.DE_G_JOLIVI as g ON p.subscriberkey = g.subscriberkey

base_primeiro_boleto

Query

-

Disparo_boleto_dia

select
    s.SubscriberKey as SubscriberKey,
    s.SubscriberKey as EmailAddress
    from [_Sent] s
    inner join [_job] jo
    on s.JobID = jo.JobID
    left join (select distinct SubscriberID, JobID from _open) O
    on s.SubscriberID = O.SubscriberID
    and s.JobID = O.JobID
    left join (select distinct SubscriberID, JobID from _click) ck
    on s.SubscriberID = ck.SubscriberID
    and s.JobID = ck.JobID
    where s.EventDate >= DATEADD(dd, 0, DATEDIFF(dd, 0, GETDATE()))
    and ltrim(rtrim(jo.EmailName)) in (
    'E-mail de Cobrança por BOLETO'
    )

-

classificacao_matriz

Select subscriberkey,"Matriz"
  from (
select *,case when data_de_entrada > dateadd(d,-6,getdate()) then 'Gauntlet'
              when data_de_entrada > dateadd(d,-30,getdate()) then 'onboarding'
              when data_click > dateadd(d,-7,getdate()) then 'Matriz 1'
              when data_click between dateadd(d,-15,getdate()) and dateadd(d,-7,getdate()) then 'Matriz 2'
              when data_click between dateadd(d,-30,getdate()) and dateadd(d,-15,getdate()) then 'Matriz 3'
              when data_open > dateadd(d,-7,getdate()) then 'Matriz 9'
              when data_open between dateadd(d,-15,getdate()) and dateadd(d,-7,getdate()) then 'Matriz 10'
              when data_open between dateadd(d,-30,getdate()) and dateadd(d,-15,getdate()) then 'Matriz 11'
              when data_click between dateadd(d,-60,getdate()) and dateadd(d,-30,getdate())then 'Matriz 4'
              when data_click between dateadd(d,-90,getdate()) and dateadd(d,-60,getdate()) then 'Matriz 5'
              when data_click between dateadd(d,-120,getdate()) and dateadd(d,-90,getdate()) then 'Matriz 6'
              when data_click between dateadd(d,-150,getdate()) and dateadd(d,-120,getdate()) then 'Matriz 7'
              when data_click between dateadd(d,-180,getdate()) and dateadd(d,-150,getdate()) then 'Matriz 8'
              when data_open between dateadd(d,-60,getdate()) and dateadd(d,-30,getdate()) then 'Matriz 12'
              when data_open between dateadd(d,-90,getdate()) and dateadd(d,-60,getdate()) then 'Matriz 13'
              when data_open between dateadd(d,-120,getdate()) and dateadd(d,-90,getdate()) then 'Matriz 14'
              when data_open between dateadd(d,-150,getdate()) and dateadd(d,-120,getdate()) then 'Matriz 15'
              when data_open between dateadd(d,-180,getdate()) and dateadd(d,-150,getdate()) then 'Matriz 16'
              when data_open  < dateadd(d,-180,getdate()) then 'Matriz 17'
              when data_open  is null then 'Matriz 18'
       end "Matriz"
 from (  select subscriberkey,
         case when data_open is null or data_open = '' then '' else data_open end data_open,
         case when data_click is null or data_click = '' then '' else data_click end data_click,
         data_de_entrada,
         case when data_ultimo_envio is null or data_ultimo_envio = '' then '' else data_ultimo_envio end data_ultimo_envio
   from Novo_engajamento_Geralv1)A)B

Target Data Extension: Novo_engajamento_Geralv1 (Update)

title: ClassificaÃ§Ã£o Incremental
content:
Classificação Incremental

Last run: Every 1 day 5:30 AM

Screenshot

Workflow

Queries

-

1 - Seleciona Entrantes

SELECT
T1.SUBSCRIBERKEY,
T1.DATA_DE_ENTRADA,
T1.XCODE
FROM
ENT.DE_G_JOLIVI T1
LEFT JOIN CLASSIFICACAO_JOLIVI T3
   ON T3.SUBSCRIBERKEY = T1.SUBSCRIBERKEY
WHERE
T1.DATA_DE_ENTRADA >=  DATEADD(day,-1,convert(date,GETDATE()))
AND T1.DATA_DE_ENTRADA < DATEADD(day,0,convert(date,GETDATE()))
AND T3.SUBSCRIBERKEY IS NULL

Target Data Extension: Entrantes_Jolivi (Overwrite)

-

2 - Insere os Entrantes

SELECT
SUBSCRIBERKEY,
DATA_DE_ENTRADA,
XCODE,
'NOVO' AS ENGAJAMENTO_ABERTURA,
'NOVO' AS ENGAJAMENTO_CLIQUE,
'ATIVADO' AS CATEGORIA,
DATEDIFF(day,data_de_entrada,GETDATE()) AS Qtde_dias_cadastrado
FROM
ENTRANTES_JOLIVI

Target Data Extension: Classificacao_Jolivi (Append)

-

0 - Atualiza Status

SELECT
T1.SUBSCRIBERKEY,
T2.STATUS
FROM Classificacao_Jolivi_Homologacao T1
LEFT JOIN ENT.DV_SUBSCRIBERS_HIST T2
ON T1.SUBSCRIBERKEY = T2.EMAILADDRESS

Target Data Extension: Classificacao_Jolivi (Update)

-

1 - Atualiza Qtde dias Cadastrados

SELECT
SUBSCRIBERKEY,
DATEDIFF(day,data_de_entrada,GETDATE()) AS Qtde_dias_cadastrado
FROM
Classificacao_Jolivi_Homologacao

Target Data Extension: Classificacao_Jolivi (Update)

-

3.1 - Calcula os envios

SELECT
    e.subscriberkey,
    COUNT(S.eventdate) AS total_enviados
FROM CLASSIFICACAO_JOLIVI E
LEFT JOIN _Sent S ON S.subscriberkey = e.subscriberkey
WHERE
eventdate >= GETDATE() - 30
GROUP BY e.subscriberkey

Target Data Extension: Classificacao_Jolivi (Update)

-

3.2 - Calcula as aberturas

SELECT
    e.subscriberkey,
    COUNT(S.eventdate) AS TOTAL_ABERTOS
FROM CLASSIFICACAO_JOLIVI E
LEFT JOIN _Open S ON S.subscriberkey = e.subscriberkey
WHERE
eventdate >= GETDATE() - 30
AND ISUNIQUE = 1
GROUP BY e.subscriberkey

Target Data Extension: Classificacao_Jolivi (Update)

-

3.3 - Calcula os cliques

SELECT
    e.subscriberkey,
    COUNT(S.eventdate) AS TOTAL_CLIQUES
FROM CLASSIFICACAO_JOLIVI E
LEFT JOIN _CLICK S ON S.subscriberkey = e.subscriberkey
WHERE
eventdate >= GETDATE() - 30
AND ISUNIQUE = 1
GROUP BY e.subscriberkey

Target Data Extension: Classificacao_Jolivi (Update)

-

4.1 - Calcula taxa abertura

SELECT
    SUBSCRIBERKEY,
    CAST(TOTAL_ABERTOS AS DECIMAL (10,2)) / CAST(TOTAL_ENVIADOS AS DECIMAL (10,2)) * 100.00 AS TAXA_ABERTURA,
    CAST(TOTAL_CLIQUES AS DECIMAL (10,2)) / CAST(TOTAL_ENVIADOS AS DECIMAL (10,2)) * 100.00  AS TAXA_CLIQUE
FROM CLASSIFICACAO_JOLIVI E WITH(NOLOCK)
WHERE TOTAL_ENVIADOS > 0

Target Data Extension: Classificacao_Jolivi (Update)

-

4.2 - Calcula taxa abertura sobre clique

SELECT
SUBSCRIBERKEY,
CAST(TOTAL_CLIQUES AS DECIMAL (10,2)) / CAST(TOTAL_ABERTOS AS DECIMAL (10,2)) * 100.00  AS TAXA_CLIQUE_ABERTURA
FROM CLASSIFICACAO_JOLIVI
WHERE TOTAL_ABERTOS > 0

Target Data Extension: Classificacao_Jolivi (Update)

-

5.1 - Recebe classificação engajamento abertura

SELECT
SUBSCRIBERKEY,
CASE WHEN QTDE_DIAS_CADASTRADO <= 30 THEN 'NOVO'
     WHEN TOTAL_CLIQUES > 0 THEN 'ENGAJADO'
     WHEN TOTAL_CLIQUES = 0 AND TAXA_ABERTURA >= 10 THEN 'INTERESSADO'
     WHEN TOTAL_CLIQUES = 0 AND TAXA_ABERTURA < 10 THEN 'NAO ENGAJADO'
END AS Engajamento_Abertura
FROM
CLASSIFICACAO_JOLIVI

Target Data Extension: Classificacao_Jolivi (Update)

-

5.2 - Recebe classificação engajamento clique sobre abertura

SELECT
SUBSCRIBERKEY,
CASE WHEN (TAXA_CLIQUE_ABERTURA >= '30.00')  THEN 'ALTO ENGAJADO'
        WHEN (TAXA_CLIQUE_ABERTURA >= '10.00' )  THEN 'BAIXO ENGAJADO'
        ELSE 'NAO ENGAJADO'
    END AS ENGAJAMENTO_CLIQUE
FROM
CLASSIFICACAO_JOLIVI
WHERE
DATA_DE_ENTRADA >= GETDATE() - 31
AND DATA_DE_ENTRADA < GETDATE() - 30

Target Data Extension: Classificacao_Jolivi (Update)

-

6 - Zera flag assinantes pagos

SELECT
SUBSCRIBERKEY,
'FALSE' AS ASSINANTE_PAGO
FROM
CLASSIFICACAO_JOLIVI

Target Data Extension: Classificacao_Jolivi (Update)

-

7 - Classifica Assinante Pago

SELECT
T1.SUBSCRIBERKEY,
'TRUE' AS ASSINANTE_PAGO,
'TRUE' AS APTO_RECEBER,
'ATIVADO' AS CATEGORIA
FROM
CLASSIFICACAO_JOLIVI T1
INNER JOIN ENT.JOLIVI_PLANOS T2
ON T1.SUBSCRIBERKEY = T2.SUBSCRIBERKEY

Target Data Extension: Classificacao_Jolivi (Update)

JHL_RESDA_DISPAROS

select
cast(s.EventDate as date) as SendDate,
s.SubscriberKey as Email,
jo.EmailName as EmailNameJob,
jo.EmailSubject as EmailSubject,
0  as Opens,
0 as Clicks,
count(*) as Sends,
s.JobID as JobID,
SubscriberID
from [_Sent] s
inner join [_job] jo
on s.JobID = jo.JobID
where cast(s.EventDate as date) between '2018-12-10' and '2019-01-31'
and (upper(jo.EmailName) like '%_RESDA_%' or upper(jo.EmailName) like '%_ALZHEIMER_%')
group by cast(s.EventDate as date),
s.SubscriberKey,
jo.EmailName,
jo.EmailSubject,
s.JobID,
SubscriberID

Target Data Extension: JHL_RESDA_DISPAROS (Overwrite)

-

RESDA_OPEN_CLICK

select
s.SendDate,
s.EmailNameJob,
s.Email,
s.JobID,
sum(case when O.SubscriberID is not null then 1 else 0 end) as Opens,
sum(case when ck.SubscriberID is not null then 1 else 0 end) as Clicks
from ent.JHL_RESDA_DISPAROS s
left join (select distinct SubscriberID, JobID from _open) O
on s.SubscriberID = O.SubscriberID
and s.JobID = O.JobID
left join (select distinct SubscriberID, JobID from _click) ck
on s.SubscriberID = ck.SubscriberID
and s.JobID = ck.JobID
group by s.SendDate,
s.EmailNameJob,
s.Email,
s.JobID

Workflow

Queries

-

disparo_hotlist_CAI

select
cast(s.EventDate as date) as SendDate,
null as OpenDate,
null as ClickDate,
s.SubscriberKey as Email,
jo.EmailName as EmailNameJob,
jo.EmailSubject as EmailSubject,
0 as EntryDate,
ej.xcode as EntryXcode,
sum(case when O.SubscriberID is not null then 1 else 0 end) as Opens,
sum(case when ck.SubscriberID is not null then 1 else 0 end) as Clicks,
0 as UniqueOpens,
0 as UniqueClicks,
count(*) as Sends
from [_Sent] s
inner join [_job] jo
on s.JobID = jo.JobID
left join (select distinct SubscriberID, JobID from _open) O
on s.SubscriberID = O.SubscriberID
and s.JobID = O.JobID
left join (select distinct SubscriberID, JobID from _click) ck
on s.SubscriberID = ck.SubscriberID
and s.JobID = ck.JobID
left join ENT.Hotlist_Coração_Anti_infarto_Externa ej
on s.Subscriberkey = ej.Subscriberkey
where s.EventDate >= dateadd(d,-10,getdate())
and ltrim(rtrim(jo.EmailName)) in (
'Welcome Teaser Lair - Coração Anti-Infarto - Externa',
'Welcome aula exclusiva do Lair - Coração Anti-Infarto',
'Welcome Guia Pressão Alta - Coração Anti-Infarto - Externa',

title: Jolivi - Jornada Gauntlet Free
content:
Jolivi - Jornada Gauntlet Free

Last run: Every 1 hour [xx]:30

Screenshot

Workflow

Queries

-

Gauntlet Free Entry

SELECT
T1.SUBSCRIBERKEY,
T1.DATA_DE_ENTRADA,
T1.XCODE,
CASE
when xcode = 'XJ-MEL-JOLI-SDA-X-X-Q2-X-X' then 'Quiz Alzheimer'
when xcode = 'XJ-MEL-JOLI-LPVMJ06-X-X-LP-X-X' then 'Hormonios'
when xcode = 'XJ-MI-JOLI-QUIZTESTO-X-X-QUIZ-X-X' then 'Quiz Testosterona'
when xcode = 'XJ-MEL-FB-HF02-SUBHL-L1-X-PP-2-X' then 'Homem de Ferro MKT'
when xcode = 'XJ-MEL-FB-HF02-SUBHL-L1-X-PP-1-X' then 'Homem de Ferro MKT'
when xcode = 'XJ-MEL-FB-HF02-SUBHL-L1-X-PP-3-X' then 'Homem de Ferro MKT'
when xcode = 'XJ-MEL-FB-HF02-SUBHL-L1-X-PP-4-X' then 'Homem de Ferro MKT'
when xcode = 'XJ-MEL-FB-HF02-SUBHL-L1-X-PP-5-X' then 'Homem de Ferro MKT'
when xcode = 'XJ-MEL-OB-LPHF01-X-X-PP-X-X' then 'Homem de Ferro MKT'
when xcode like '%LPUZC01%' then 'Dr Uronal'
when xcode like '%EMP-SSA%' then 'Super Saude Anual'
when xcode like '%XJ-MEL-FB-PTHF-SUBHL-L1-PP-1-X%' then 'Prostata'
when xcode like '%XJ-MEL-FB-PTHF-SUBHL-L1-PP-2-X%' then 'Prostata'
when xcode like '%XJ-MEL-OB-PTHF-X-X-PP-X-X%' then 'Prostata'
when xcode like '%VMJ%' then 'Voce mais jovem'
ELSE 'DEFAULT' END AS GAUNTLET
FROM CLASSIFICACAO_JOLIVI T1
LEFT JOIN ENT.JOLIVI_PLANOS T2
ON T1.SUBSCRIBERKEY = T2.SUBSCRIBERKEY
WHERE
T2.SUBSCRIBERKEY IS NULL
AND data_de_entrada >= DATEADD(day,-2,convert(date,GETDATE()))
AND data_de_entrada  < DATEADD(day,0,convert(date,GETDATE()))
AND T1.SUBSCRIBERKEY NOT IN (SELECT SUBSCRIBERKEY FROM ENT.DE_G_HOTLIST WHERE HL_CODE = 'JHL_HF')

title: Jolivi - Jornada Gauntlet Pagos
content:
Jolivi - Jornada Gauntlet Pagos

Last run: Every 1 day 10:00 AM

Screenshot

Workflow

Queries

-

Gauntlet Pagos Entry

SELECT
SubscriberKey,
name,
CASE WHEN parent_id = 'palavra-lair-anual-livro' THEN 'Combo Palavra e Livro'
     WHEN parent_id = '303237099' THEN 'Diabetes Zero Essencial'
     WHEN parent_id = '203236099' THEN 'Diabetes Zero'
     WHEN parent_id = '200632006' then 'Homem de Ferro - Essential'
     WHEN parent_id = '202132099' THEN 'Relançamento CAI'
     WHEN parent_id = '200631099' THEN 'HF Dossie BB'
     WHEN PLAN_ID = '102200012' and coalesce(parent_id,'N/A') <> '200900006' THEN 'Dossie Anual'
     WHEN parent_id = '102208099' THEN 'Dossie Anual'
     WHEN parent_id = '102201099' and plan_id= '102200099' THEN 'Dossie Vitalicio + Expresso'
     WHEN PLAN_ID = '100500012' and coalesce(parent_id,'N/A') not in ('101600012', '200900006')  THEN 'Conexao Cerebro Anual'
     WHEN PLAN_ID = '103300012' and coalesce(parent_id,'N/A') not in ('101600012', '103300030', '200900006')  THEN 'Remedio Natural Anual'
     WHEN parent_id = '100415099' then 'Palavra Lair Anual'
     WHEN (PLAN_ID = '100400012' and coalesce(parent_id,'N/A') not in  ('palavra-lair-anual-livro', '200900006','2021114099','101426099','100434012')) THEN 'Palavra Lair Anual'
     WHEN parent_id = '100409099' THEN 'Palavra Lair Anual'
     WHEN parent_id = '100406099' THEN 'Palavra Lair Anual'
     WHEN parent_id='book-offer-emagreca-comendo'  THEN 'Palavra do Lair Mensal'
     WHEN parent_id='200900006' THEN 'Golden Six Combo'
     WHEN parent_id ='200807099' THEN 'Golden Six'
     WHEN PLAN_ID = '200600006' AND coalesce(parent_id,'N/A') <> '202700099' THEN 'Homem de Ferro'
     WHEN PLAN_ID = '201000006' AND coalesce(parent_id,'N/A') <> '202700099' THEN 'Vida Sem Dor'
     WHEN PLAN_ID = '201300099' AND coalesce(parent_id,'N/A') <> '202700099' THEN 'SOS Artrite'
     WHEN PLAN_ID = '201505099' AND coalesce(parent_id,'N/A') <> '202700099' THEN '30 Anos Mais Jovem'
     WHEN parent_id = '2021114099' then 'Coracao Anti-infarto'
     WHEN parent_id = '101600012' THEN 'Combo Remedio Conexao'
     WHEN parent_id = '101400012' or parent_id = '101426099' THEN 'Clube Jolivi'
     WHEN parent_id = '201707099'  THEN 'Mais Visao'
     WHEN parent_id = '103300030' THEN 'FREE TRIAL REMEDIO'
     WHEN parent_id = '202515099' then 'Coracao Anti-infarto Essencial'
     WHEN parent_id = '101812012' THEN 'Super Saude Anual'
     WHEN parent_id = 'book-offer-remedio-natural' THEN 'Remédio Mensal'
     WHEN parent_id = '201913099' then 'Voce Mais Jovem'
     WHEN parent_id = '202519099' then 'Coluna 100%'
     WHEN parent_id = '103321099' then 'Remédio Natural Vitalício + Expresso + Grande Livro da Saúde Natural'
     WHEN parent_id = '103322012' then 'Remedio Natural Anual + Big Book'
     WHEN parent_id = '102225099' then 'Dossiê Vitalício + Expresso + Grande Livro da Saúde Natural'
     WHEN parent_id = '102224012' then 'Dossiê Anual + Big Book'
     WHEN parent_id = '100524012' then 'Conexão Anual + O Grande Livro'
     WHEN parent_id = '100525099' then 'Conexão Vitalício + Expresso + O Grande Livro'
     WHEN parent_id = '203028099' then 'SuperCerebro Sem Alzheimer'
     WHEN parent_id = '102927012' then 'Dossie Essencial Livro'
     WHEN parent_id in ('100420012','100434012') then 'Palavra + Livro CAI'
     WHEN parent_id = '203029099' then 'SuperCerebro Sem Alzheimer Essencial'
     WHEN parent_id = '100530012' then 'Conexão Anual + O Grande Livro'
     ELSE (convert(varchar,parent_id,101) + '-' + convert(varchar,PLAN_ID,101))
    END AS GAUNTLET,
    joined_date as Payment_date
FROM ent.DE_JOLIVI_PAID
WHERE
(PLAN_ID IN ('101426099','100525099','100524012','102224012','102225099','103322012','103321099','102200012','201300099','100500012','102200099','103300012','100400012','100700000','200800006','200600006','201000006','100400001', '103300001', '102200099', '201500099')
or parent_id in('303237099','203236099','100434012','200632006','100530012','203029099','102927012','100420012','203028099','202700099','202519099','100415099','202515099','2021114099','200807099','101812012','201913099','palavra-lair-anual-livro','102201099', '201000006','201300099','201505099','101400012','101400012' ,'101600012','100406099','201707099','103300030','book-offer-remedio-natural','book-offer-emagreca-comendo','200900006' ,'200600006','102208099','100409099','200631099','202132099'))
AND upper(STATUS) in  ('COMPLETE', 'UPSELLING')
AND cast(joined_date as date) >= DATEADD(day,-3,convert(date,GETDATE()))
AND cast(joined_date as date)  < DATEADD(day,0,convert(date,GETDATE()))
AND (cycles < 2 or cycles is null)

Target Data Extension: Gauntlet_Pagos (Overwrite)

- classificacao_matriz

Select subscriberkey,"Matriz"
from (
select *,case when data_de_entrada > dateadd(d,-6,getdate()) then 'Gauntlet'
          when data_de_entrada > dateadd(d,-30,getdate()) then 'onboarding'
          when data_click > dateadd(d,-7,getdate()) then 'Matriz 1'
          when data_click between dateadd(d,-15,getdate()) and dateadd(d,-7,getdate()) then 'Matriz 2'
          when data_click between dateadd(d,-30,getdate()) and dateadd(d,-15,getdate()) then 'Matriz 3'
          when data_open > dateadd(d,-7,getdate()) then 'Matriz 9'
          when data_open between dateadd(d,-15,getdate()) and dateadd(d,-7,getdate()) then 'Matriz 10'
          when data_open between dateadd(d,-30,getdate()) and dateadd(d,-15,getdate()) then 'Matriz 11'
          when data_click between dateadd(d,-60,getdate()) and dateadd(d,-30,getdate())then 'Matriz 4'
          when data_click between dateadd(d,-90,getdate()) and dateadd(d,-60,getdate()) then 'Matriz 5'
          when data_click between dateadd(d,-120,getdate()) and dateadd(d,-90,getdate()) then 'Matriz 6'
          when data_click between dateadd(d,-150,getdate()) and dateadd(d,-120,getdate()) then 'Matriz 7'
          when data_click between dateadd(d,-180,getdate()) and dateadd(d,-150,getdate()) then 'Matriz 8'
          when data_open between dateadd(d,-60,getdate()) and dateadd(d,-30,getdate()) then 'Matriz 12'
          when data_open between dateadd(d,-90,getdate()) and dateadd(d,-60,getdate()) then 'Matriz 13'
          when data_open between dateadd(d,-120,getdate()) and dateadd(d,-90,getdate()) then 'Matriz 14'
          when data_open between dateadd(d,-150,getdate()) and dateadd(d,-120,getdate()) then 'Matriz 15'
          when data_open between dateadd(d,-180,getdate()) and dateadd(d,-150,getdate()) then 'Matriz 16'
          when data_open  < dateadd(d,-180,getdate()) then 'Matriz 17'
          when data_open  is null then 'Matriz 18'
   end "Matriz"
from (  select subscriberkey,
     case when data_open is null or data_open = '' then '' else data_open end data_open,
     case when data_click is null or data_click = '' then '' else data_click end data_click,
     data_de_entrada,
     case when data_ultimo_envio is null or data_ultimo_envio = '' then '' else data_ultimo_envio end data_ultimo_envio
from Novo_engajamento_Geralv1)A)B
